column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Mr Thomas Malcom Knox'''.

column1: *'''Contents:''' A letter of thanks for Knox's hospitality when Tolkien delivered his lecture ''[[On Fairy-Stories]]'' at the [[Wikipedia:University of St Andrews|University of St Andrews]] in [[1939]]. Tolkien also sends Knox a copy of ''[[Essays Presented to Charles Williams]]''.<ref>{{CG|C}}
*'''Publication:''' A facsimile was published in ''[[Tree of Tales]]''.
